channel.title: csv on The long way through Software Craftsmanship
channel.description: Recent content in csv on The long way through Software Craftsmanship

item.title: Validating CSV data in clojure
item.description: At a client, we have CSVs of data that can be simplified to this 1: (def data [ ["total" 6 8 13] ["0" 1 2 3] ["0" 2 0 4] ["0" 3 0 6] ]) In this case, some of the row named total is the sum of the rest of the rows, but only for some columns (second and fourth). We do not want to get rid of the columns, as they need to be printed at the end.
